products.title: Roma Thunderbird - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma thunderbird is not a shade to be missed - as in, it simply can't be. Bold and memorable, this blind is almost opaque, yet doesn't block out the light entirely, making for a great compromise. Don't be shy; use the thunderbird as a central feature in your white or cream kitchen, or go bold in the bathroom by opting for a non-traditional colour scheme of red and white. Or you might find that this daring red provides you with all the motivation you need in your home office.

products.title: Semana Thunder
products.description: Roller blinds made to measure roller blind semana thunder made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Lux Dark Thunder Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms and living rooms where you need to block all of the light - like when trying to sleep or when there is glare on your tv.

products.title: Prism Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: Prism thunder combines a cheery and welcoming style of printing with a slightly colder and more distant colour scheme. The end result is a design that welcomes you through the door before slowing things down and taking the edge off. The light blues make this the perfect addition to the master bedroom so that you can switch off and begin to wind down. It's all about adding in other slightly faded colours like greens and browns.

products.title: Neo Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: The neo thunder is a grey-blue, ornately patterned filter blind that is sure to add something a little different to your home. The high quality fabric hangs on an easy-to-use rolling mechanism, so using this blind is as simple you would want it to be. Unite the thunder with creams, greys, and muted blues in an older child's bedroom or playroom for a subtle and fun style; or use in the guest bedroom to give your visitors a warm and eye-catching welcome.
